sentences.english: Students in this program can not apply for extension of the study.
sentences.chinese: 該短訓班不接受延長學習期限申請。

sentences.english: We plan to run some short-term training.
sentences.chinese: 我們計劃辦一些短訓班。

sentences.english: The short-term training class has been run three times.
The present company is just a springboard and a temporary training class.
sentences.chinese: 眼下這間公司只是一個跳板，一個短訓班。

sentences.english: They train technical cardres in short course.
sentences.chinese: 他們辦短訓班培養技術幹部。

sentences.english: They were sent to hospitals to attend short-term training courses.
sentences.chinese: 他們被派到醫院去參加短訓班。
